sabaya lankawe bhasha prashnaya pradhana ekak weyi..migara mahaththayata anuwa nam //pradhana prashnaya wi aththe demalun sinhala igena ganimata dakwana akamaththayi// ema nisa ethuma pradhana wisaduma widiyata demalunta sinhala iganwimata yojana karayi..thawa ethuma sanwardhana ha aarthika prathilabha niyamakarawa bedinoyame prashnayak athibawa piliganiyi.eyada ethuma demalunge kula prashnayakata barakarayi..aho kedayaki..

nadaye 14 denaku samanga me daruwanda siya mawpiyan samanga katharagamata pamina thibe.mese awasanawantha lesa miyagos aththe alpitiya anuruddha kanitu pasale 3wani wasare igenuma labu romesh ha lakshmika yana niwun daruwan dede‡∑ônaki.daruwange piya wana somadasa mahatha pawasuwe daruwan namin siti athara hadisiyema diye gili athurudahan wu bawa nadaye pirisa pawasu bawayi.mowun alpitiya pradeshaye kurundugaha 8 kanuwa padinchi me daruwan alpitiya anuruddha kanitu widuhale 3wani wasare igenuma labamin sita atha..
